description:
- Modern Yukata: Violet "A modern outfit based on traditional Wa summer clothes."
 - Modern Kids' Yukata: Violet "A modern kids' outfit based on traditional Wa summer clothes."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it. 
 - Ihm Mask: Worn Sideways "A papier‐mâché mask modeled after an Ihm."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
name: Modern Yukata Set: Violet
